short.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G: Learn new words everytime you open a new tab!

long.am,ar,bg,bn,ca,cs,da,de,el,en,en_AU,en_G:
Learn a word each time you open a new tab! TabWords enables you to learn new words by showing you flashcards on each new tab opening.

You can simply add the words and translations you want and later see these words as flashcards on each tab opening.

TabWords understands the words you learn and removes them from your list automatically.
